extension_description.message: This extension allows you to easily search for translations of phrases in English, Polish, German, Spanish and French

menu_page_path.description: The path to the localized menu page.

update_page_path.description: The path to the localized update page.

dictionary_com.description: The name visible on the dictionary choice list for Dictionary.com.

merriam_webster.description: The name visible on the dictionary choice list for Merriam-Webster.

diki.description: The name visible on the dictionary choice list for Diki.

bab_la.description: The name visible on the dictionary choice list for Bab.la.

en_pl.description: Language parameter in dictionary choice list.

en_de.description: Language parameter in dictionary choice list.

en_es.description: Language parameter in dictionary choice list.

en_fr.description: Language parameter in dictionary choice list.

pl_de.description: Language parameter in dictionary choice list.

usage_info.message: To view definitions double click on a phrase while holding the ALT key.

release_notes.description: Release notes on the update page.

version_0_1_1_note.message: The key to hold while looking up a phrase has been changed from CTRL to ALT. Preserving priorly chosen dictionary has been fixed.

version_0_1_2_note.message: The extension has been adjusted to be able to work with Google Chrome.

version_0_1_3_note.message: Polish translation of the interface and release notes have been added. Styling has been improved.

version_0_2_0_note.message: Translation loading speed has been improved. The interface and logo have been redesigned. Loading translations for capitalized phrases has been fixed.

version_0_3_0_note.message: Bab.la dictionaries have been added: English to/from Polish, German, Spanish and French, also Polish to/from German. The styling of dictionaries is now kept while browsing in the pop-up. Plus minor improvements.
